sentence: In early trading on Tuesday, shares of Procter & Gamble topped the list of the day's best performing Dow Jones Industrial Average components, trading up 5.1%.
Year to date, Procter & Gamble has lost about 8.7% of its value.
And the worst performing Dow component thus far on the day is Boeing, trading down 9.7%.
Boeing is lower by about 64.1% looking at the year to date performance.
Two other components making moves today are United Technologies, trading down 7.5%, and UnitedHealth Group, trading up 5.0% on the day.
